daily-plan.description: Finish the json server and deploy it on Vercel. Need to make sure that the server is working correctly and that the data is being fetched correctly.
Work on the Todo design / css. Make sure that the app is responsive and that the data is being fetched correctly. Implement routing.
Work on the Jira ticket that is assigned to me. Make sure that the ticket is being finished and that the code is being pushed to the repository.
Go for a run or hike, workout, stretch, relax.
